titles.title: Congratulating Mr. Kermit Cintron on the successful defense of his IBF welterweight title on Saturday, 14, 2007, and for his continued success in and out of the ring.
Congratulating Mr. Kermit Cintron on the successful defense of his IBF welterweight title on Saturday, 14, 2007, and for his continued success in and out of the ring.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates Kermit Cintron, IBF welterweight champion, for his accomplishment. Thanks him for being a role model and an inspiration.
